content.detailedDescription:
There are two accounts to this story.  i will share both with you.  but i need extreme help.  i am 43 years old.  i was part of an r/c flying club in medfield, massachusetts on hospital road. i can tell you i was abudcted.  

the official story goes, this is the [pre-hypnosis] i arrived at the field at 5:30 pm for radio controlled flying.  it was an early evening august meeting, one of my first with the club and looking to start trying
to get to know some new people.  i remember arriving, and just not liking the look of the field, left, and went to get something to eat while people were not there yet. i thought it looked like someone left something on the ground at the far side of the field, and could have been an r/c plane, so i figured odd. i just did not like the feeling so i left, got something to eat, and returned. didn't feel well so left meeting early at 7:00.  tailgating ford crown victoria in back which is chocked up to being another bad massachusetts driver. really tailgating. had to cut across a travel lane into a gas station at the corner. 

[post hypnosis] 
i hope there is enough space.  i need mufon to please, contact me. i need help.  post hypnosis story is this - i am walking up the path on the rail road tracks because i don't feel like climbing over the gate that night. i walk the quarter mile walk up the track to the field that is really nicely secluded from hospital road.  i arrive on the field, and must have been in shock to see it on the ground.  i saw it behind the pegboard. there is a pegboard that holds frequency numbers when people fly it went up and over, a beam came down, and then felt another beam come down on me. i started lifting up, and then you know there is trouble. i was met inside by two small grey aliens who rushed me to another room where i was met by another being with a long neck.  in hypnosis, i was able to get a name. i then that night had an encounter with an mib in a tailgating dark ford crown vic.  my dad believes tailgating viciously.  since hypnosis, i have discovered a scoop mark on my back left shoulder, and had an octagon shape bruise on my arm. that is not natural.  i also receive telepathic messages. we hear electronic beeping noises we have nothing in the house that makes that noise. please, mufon, i need your help. please contact me so i can find a good support group to help people with this. i really feel like a best comparrison would be the guy from close encounters that went nuts in the movie and it is not a good feeling.  thank you.
content.summary: Abduction at r/c flying field hospital road, medfield mass, 08/10/2010 17:30

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i had just parked on the side parking lot of our apartment when we noticed orbs ascending into the sky.  we ran to the main parking lot to get a better view and that is when my wife started recording with her iphone.  we first noticed the orbs in the sky when my wife pointed at one and asked if it was a chinese lantern.  that's what we both assumed it was, but it was moving too fast to be a chinese lantern, and it wasn't even the chinese new year.  

orb after orb kept ascending into the sky in a pattern and we couldn't tell where they were ascending from.  

we both freaked out but were in awe because we had never seen anything like that before.  i grabbed our downstairs neighbor to see the orbs and he was freaking out as well.

eventually, the orbs stopped ascending from wherever they were ascending from.  

when we sent the video to my father, he watched it in slow motion and noticed a flying saucer towards the beginning of the video that we didn't notice until he pointed it out.
content.summary: Didn't see disc until father pointed it out (beginning of video); red orbs ascended in the sky.  two different ufos in the video.

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking photographs with my canon eos 5d camera, with 24 - 70 telephoto lens, from the top of sydney tower, of the views surrounding sydney, on the afternoon of 9th march 2016. i was not aware of anything unusual at the time. only today, 27th march 2016 when i was viewing my photographs on my pc, did i notice unusual bright lights in the sky apparently in the vicinity of sydney airport. i have 6 photos with unusual lights in the sky. in the first photo there at at least 5 discs in random formation, in the far distance, low above the horizon, to the west of sydney ( it is possible that each disc were pairs, making a total of 10). in the second shot there were 6 discs, observed low above the horizon in the far distance, apparently southwest of sydney, in the vicinity of sydney airport, in pairs and in a straight line. third shot was a single bright light, in the shape of a cigar in the similar vicinity. fourth shot was a similar shape, in similar vicinity but with also a qantas aircraft which was climbing out of sydney airport, having just taken off, in view. fifth shot was the same bright cigar shaped object in similar vicinity. sixth shot was the similar cigar shaped bright light with a different aircraft having just taken off from sydney airport in view. 
all photos were taken within about 30 minutes of each other. other photographs taken at the time, in the same direction, did not show any unusual lights. all photos were taken through glass windows but i am confident they were not reflections of lights inside the building.
i am a retired uk nats air traffic controller and current glider pilot.
content.summary: Bright lights, one cigar shaped & 6 separate discs, observed in the vicinity of sydney airport in daylight, viewed from sydney tower.

content.detailedDescription:
Hello,

i was walking my dog in sefton park around 8-9:30 at night, i had already been walking for an hour. i was just taking something to the bin, when i noticed this flash of what seemed to be orange light. and there it was a black triangle that seemed to hover around the trees. at this time my dog had run off maybe due to the hum it was producing or something else but i could still see my dog so i stayed there and watched it. i didn't have a camera with me and my phone is being fixed. i then glanced over to my dog and when i turned around it spun, and faced south and flew off at incredible speeds. i then ran over to my dog to secure him and another gentlemen ran over to me to ask me if me and my dog was alright. he had only noticed the object fly off with a bright light and a loud boom.
content.summary: It was like nothing i had experienced. time seemed to slow down.

content.detailedDescription: Flying home from phoenix to seattle aboard a boeing 737, widow seat. it is 4:35 in the afternoon. crystal clear skies. i had observed several other jets along the way higher and lower with typical con trails as the sky was perfectly clean and i was just enjoying looking out the window. i had my samsung galaxy s6 in hand playing a game on and off when i noticed a con trail directly above us with was very odd looking. the pilot said we would be flying at 35,000 feet and this craft was a good distance above us flying perpendicular to our direction. i could not estimate how far above us it was nor the speed. we were still in oregon but approaching the columbia river in the distance near the dalles oregon. there were two distinct con trails but one was dramatically different than the other so i snapped off 4 quick photos of it as we continued on. i watched as long as i could but at these speeds it only lasted a brief time. as i sat and looked at my photos and enlarged them it became more interesting as the the con trail in question had a very strange shape. as i looked more i noticed a bluish green orb with lights down in the lower left hand portion of my photo as well as other oddities. i have seen numerous photos of these strange orbs but never actually seen one myself. i have no idea what this was but it was strange. you can find other anomolies in these photos but they could be a product of the window as the sun was very bright shining from the west. as i said we were flying to seattle in a nw direction and this object was flying in sw direction. i have no idea what this was but it is certainly interesting. one photo is not in good focus but does show some sort of rainbow effect.
content.summary: Aboard aircraft flying home observed odd looking con trail and unknown anomolies.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside on my back deck, looking up toward the sky. i watched 4 very high planes go by, with no sound, and emitting trails. 2 of them went from north to southeast. 2 went west to east. i thought that was very strange. just a couple of minutes later i saw a black solid snake-like object over my trees to the east. it was spinning very slowly to make a spiral-like shape.  appeared to be close, maybe 100 ft from me. it was making it's way very slowly toward the southeast. my wife was inside the house. i wanted a second witness so i yelled at her to come outside. during the couple of seconds that i looked away to get my wife's attention, the object had gone from maybe 100 feet away to extremely high in the sky, maybe 500 feet. it took my wife and 4-year-old daughter about 5 seconds to make it to the deck. by the time they made it outside, a second object had appeared near the first object. the second object was exactly like the first object. the 2 objects slowly ascended out of site toward the southeast. all 3 of us watched the objects until they were out of site. during the sighting, a 5th plane went by, from east to west, very high in the sky, with no sound.
content.summary: 2 black snake-shaped objects, spinning slowly in a spiral, ascending out of sight toward southeast

content.detailedDescription: I have seen an ufo on the west the ufo is hovering in the sky and continuosly  changing his positon
content.summary: This is star like structre hovering in the sky and countinuosly changing his path

content.detailedDescription:
This sighting was very strange even for me , lol ! i watched the sky through the binoculars at first & for whaever reason i kept going back to saturn area & while i viewed it , there went a bright white ufo in the 1/3 portion of the lenses & the planet , aha i said & kept watching the planet's area & sure enough something was in front of it too (?) it appeared to be changing , yet a planet cannot change its shape nor its angle ! at this point i made a call to my neighbour & spoke with him about what i was seeing , unfortuanately he wasn't at home yet , i've inquired if once he gets back to go together with his camera that has a long lens to take a long exposure & see it better of why saturn is doing this wierd thing , but his camera was damaged from last time so nothing came of it . i have continued to view the planet & scanning the sky & taken photos both with iphone & with my camera . in total a 10 pics were taken . the photo i'm attaching is the rather mid sized green orb by the moon this time which i did not seen with my eyes at all ! the weird looking , whatever was in front & about the planet , those pics i 'm not attaching yet , as i'm trying to make sense of what i've got . 
the biggest question i do have , if that is supposed to be " saturn " the , why does the angles of it change , the size , the multiple shapes appeared & other oddest things in those pics ?! 
i will if needed , email those pics but directly to mufon's hq with the same report # here .
content.summary: Very strange sighting this night . some activity seen near saturn but not the 1 above the moon that is on photo (attached here in the report).

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting in hot tub at 9:45pm pt...
glow of v shaped lights 5qty one at tip other two close to each other in rear of v, odd and dim, no flashing lights or front directional for this traffic area for flights.
blown away....... phoenix lights again in so cal
distance as it past i lost sight
content.summary: You can hear all aircraft at all altitudes.....This was a distinct v shape, silent with 5 glow lites

content.detailedDescription: We went outside to have a cigarette and while we were smoking i saw a bright flash of light and then it was gone. a few seconds later in the same spot i saw it again and got my wifes attention. a couple seconds later it did it again. we kept watching and it did this 4-5 more times in almost the same place, and then nothing. there were no clouds in the sky. i did notice a searchlight lighting up the sky but not in the same area.
content.summary: Bright light that would disappear then come back

content.detailedDescription: My family and i were out to look at jupiter and the moon with a telescope.  at 9:00 pm my daughter said "what is that" as she pointed to 6-7 glowing orange orbs moving in perfect formation.  my wife is ex military and a pilot and we just discussed the lighting on commercial aircraft before the sighting.  we instantly knew this was nothing like we had ever seen.  the objects descended below and behind the trees so we went to the side of our property for a better view.  one object reappeared shortly joined by two more in a triangular formation before basically vanishing.  total time 10 minutes.  i had everyone go inside and draw a picture of what they saw.  four witnessed the event.
content.summary: 5-7 glowing orbs moving in an m shaped formation.  descended below trees.  one emerged and two more joined formation.  then gone.

content.detailedDescription: Coming back from the store on my bicycle about 11:20pm, noticed a pale orangeish light almost directly above which looked out of place. first thought it was a helicopter but no flashing lights so it wasn't an aircraft of known origin, it was followed by another which looked the same but was moving a little faster, which is when i knew it wasn't normal. watched them for an estimated 2-3 minutes moving west, then the first one turned north/northwest followed by the second one about 30 seconds later. the lead one just faded out on a seemingly ascending trajectory moving away from me the same for the second. it was very cool... my reaction was i wish i had a camera or smartphone to record what i saw.
content.summary: 2 pale orange lights moving fairly slow one following other

content.detailedDescription: I was letting my dogs outside, as i usually do before bed, and looked up to observe the night sky. i noticed this brightly flickering/flashing light that was changing at least 3 colors, maybe 4. the colors where white, red, and blue and or green. i watched it thinking it must be a planet(although my gut told me itseemed to large). i have very little knowledge of astronomy. i asked my wife to look too. i watched it for 5-10 minutes to see if it would move. when it didn't move i decided to go turn in for the night. it took about 15 minutes to get ready for bed when i decided to see if it was still there. when i got outside again to look it was gone. there was a slight, patchy, and thin cloud cover that was not there 15 min prior. although the cloud cover i could still see stars in that area of the sky that i had seen earlier when observing the flickering flashing light.  thought i migh be crazy so asked my wife to look and she saw no more sign of it either. looking w sw from my house it looked like it should have been over or in the direction of btv airport.
content.summary: I thought it was possibly a planet so watched closely for 5-10 min. when it didn't move i went inside and check again for it in 15-20 min and it was not there anymore.

content.detailedDescription: I really did not see it till i was looking at the photo. i was just taking a pic of one of our beautiful sunsets on the hill by my shop. i like cloud pic cause of the formations and faces i see. this photo has some amazing faces also. it was taken with a cheap straight talk phone because thats all i can seem to hang on to.I have some more pics that i took where i could actually see them.I took this one like 3 yrs ago and have only shown it to friends that might not think me crazy. i do not converse with the local authorities who would say say i need help. i have seen at least 5 ufo's and two with witnesses. one followed me. its like some of them know they are being watched. i also live by a large military base and know they have some weird stuff. i tried to tell some people about their drones but noone wanted to hear that, but it came out 6 mos later in the paper that they had 6 drones. i have seen them going along the river. i don't even like to look at the night sky much anymore. you tell one ufo story and some might believe it but five? i pretty much keep quiet about it. i did not research anything until a week ago and man was i amazed at the stories. then i found your site and thought well what the hell.I have seen the orbs and the upright v 2 times and the lights behind the clouds. my truck was totally disabled one night with five people aboard. anyway hence the crazy man. i have no expectations so fire away.
content.summary: Upright cyld with aura round about.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was in my back yard sitting at a bonfire when i heard a hum coming from the  left of me up in the sky. when i first saw it i thought it was a jet because we have a lot of planes fly over our house. but then i realized it was totally stationary and it was spinning clockwise. it had a very blinding light on each edge of the triangle. then out of the blue another one appeared and they started spinning in sequence together. i felt a strong physical weakness while i was looking at them. kind of like a beam was striping me off all my strength. i was with my dad at the time and we were totally in awe at these things in the sky. after the encounter i felt scared and i had a since of being worth nothing. it scared me so much that i couldn't write a report until now because i thought they would come back and abduct me. but now that it has been almost a year i feel safe. i was looking at the two objects and they started blinking and fading in and out until finally disappearing leaving the sky looking kind of warped.
content.summary: I looked up in the sky and saw a triangle with a light on each edge then it dissipated.

content.detailedDescription: I am a 58 year old white female, i have been an abductee all my life, as my mother was. i have decided to finally tell my (stories) too many to list here. i do have some very pertainet information, that to the best of my knowledge no one has ever stated in any reports i have ever read. the abduction of my husband was as follows: i have never had a memory of him ever being abducted. in november of 2014 at approximately 2:53am i was in bed the foot of the bed facing a sliding glass door, when i awoke to a presence i laid in bed and observed a 30foot disc like object that appeared to be vertical so i could observe the undercarriage of the object. i observed i believe at least 3 circular rows of lights, most outer edge being red, then inner circle was white, then center row was green. it is so strange but i scooted over to one side of the bed as so they wouldn't see me. fell back to sleep for what reason i don't understand, but this will happen to me like they have total control over my reactions/behaviors. the next thing i remember is i could hear my dog running from the side of the bed, it startled me as it awoke me with her running and her nails clicking on the hardwood floor. i remember running down the hall and yelling her name, she would normally come to me. as i approached the end of the hall and turned to go into the living room which was to the right, i saw her sitting and staring at the front door, it has frosted glass and i could see a red and a green blinking lights. i squatted down, and checked to see if she was breathing, calling her name, her ears were perked up, and she had no knowledge of my presence. i can remember saying aloud ok she is a live, then the lights stopped blinking and she was back out of her trance. i went to the chair where my husband had been sleeping, and he was not there. i looked out the sliding glass door in the front, and i saw what they had planted in my mind, i said oh its ok there is just cars parked in front so the people can go into church! they are very clever to plant images, so they can control you. i then started to walk into the kitchen when i came face to face with a 4 foot tall white colored entity, and a 5 foot tall grey. i poked the white entity, and stated "what did you do to my dog". then when i realized i poked (him) my finger nail went into his skin, i then drew my finger back looked at my nail, and stated "i'm sorry i didn't mean to hurt you!
content.summary: Observed a 30 disc with under carage facing me/it was turned on its side, which was to back of house landed just above house in front, red, greenish lights flashing thru the frosted glass front door, husban was abducted,       above our home, in the front

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling home from a friends house late friday night march 25, 2016 on highway us-40 from plainfield, indiana to indianapolis, about a 12 minute drive. halfway through the drive i noticed high in the sky a bright redish-orange object freefalling towards the ground at a rapid rate of speed. it fell into an empty field just to my left. it almost looked like a flare but with a brigther intensity. i know the indianapolis international airport is in this area but it was no airplane...The only thing it could be described similar to is a flare. it got my attention at first because of how bright it was and how fast it was freefalling almost in a tail spin to the ground..I would say it almost started out at airplane level. i was startled at first and wish i would have had my phone out in time to take a picture or video but everything happened so fast. i decided to keep driving home instead of checking what was in the field but i regretted not stopping and looking the whole way home.
content.summary: Sphere like bright object desencding rapidly towards grown

content.detailedDescription:
1 myself, my mother and my boyfriend were sitting enjoying the sunshine and having a cold drink at our garden table in our back garden of our house.

2 my boyfriend first noticed it, it was a clear blue sky and the airplane (a commercial)was easy to see - & was on a regular flight path & easily in line of sight.

3 i knew it was unusual/illogical (not normal) straight away: (but i never like to jump to conclusions)

4 what i/we saw was a commercial aircraft (i think i could make out it was white and had red on its tail fin), it made a white vapour trail-(as normal). we saw a v bright white object dipping above, below and behind the vapour trail,- very close to the tail of the plane. it was keeping pace with, and very close to the rear of the plane. when this object moved - it 'zipped-about'- 'playfully'&(changed direction unnaturally quickly).
(for info it was larger than star size)

5 astonishment & excitement. also i was glad that we all saw it, and were able to discuss and confirm what we saw with each other-as we were witnessing it.

6 personally, i ran into the house to get my binoculars - but by the time i focussed in on the plane it was flying out of my/our line of sight (became obscured by our neighbours roof top), but my boyfriend and my mother continuously watched it until it flew out of sight.
content.summary: A glowing orb chasing a commercial aircraft vapour trail

content.detailedDescription: i went out around 10 p.M. sat in my truck in my backyard i owner around 100 acres of land in worth county georgia i was sitting in my truck smoking a cigar when i saw what seemed to be a dull light in front of me slowly increasing in intensity i thought it was someone in the woods with a flashlight but it increased in brightness to a brilliant white light as i sat there i saw it slowly rise 2 around 10 maybe 20 feet high i'm not sure it sat there for a moment and then started to move left of me through a path through the trees in my woods i could see it flashing through the woods between the trees it came out the other end near my pond it rose up and disappeared i was amazed at what happened i looked and about 5 seconds later it reappeared went back into the tree line went through the trees and started to rise at a 45 degree angle after it got above the trees it accelerated rapidly at a 45 degree angle into the sky heading southwest and disappeared i've never seen anything like this before the next morning i went out into my backyard where i saw it appear and i noticed about a 8 foot dark greenish brown circle in the ground i looked at it for a while in the basement i started to go back to my house and i noticed another one eight hundred feet away approximately so i walked to it and it was identical then i noticed another one towards my house and it was almost in a perfect triangle 100 foot apart it stayed there for several weeks even after repeated mowing it stayed there and did not disappear until after the first winter frost i have never seen anything like this before it was amazin
content.summary: ufo appeared in backyard hundred feet away rose hubbard took off through trees

content.detailedDescription: i went out around 10 p.M. sat in my truck in my backyard i owner around 100 acres of land in worth county georgia i was sitting in my truck smoking a cigar when i saw what seemed to be a dull light in front of me slowly increasing in intensity i thought it was someone in the woods with a flashlight but it increased in brightness to a brilliant white light as i sat there i saw it slowly rise 2 around 10 maybe 20 feet high i'm not sure it sat there for a moment and then started to move left of me through a path through the trees in my woods i could see it flashing through the woods between the trees it came out the other end near my pond it rose up and disappeared i was amazed at what happened i looked and about 5 seconds later it reappeared went back into the tree line went through the trees and started to rise at a 45 degree angle after it got above the trees it accelerated rapidly at a 45 degree angle into the sky heading southwest and disappeared i've never seen anything like this before the next morning i went out into my backyard where i saw it appear and i noticed about a 8 foot dark greenish brown circle in the ground i looked at it for a while in the basement i started to go back to my house and i noticed another one eight hundred feet away approximately so i walked to it and it was identical then i noticed another one towards my house and it was almost in a perfect triangle 100 foot apart it stayed there for several weeks even after repeated mowing it stayed there and did not disappear until after the first winter frost i have never seen anything like this before it was amazin
content.summary: ufo appeared in backyard hundred feet away rose hubbard took off through trees

content.detailedDescription: I work on a cruise ship, and one morning i came out to smoke on the forward deck...I was drinking coffee around 5 :30 a.M  and saw that huge light surounding like whole area around ship and much more,going fast straight forward like its going to hit the star..Couple of crew members were there too..One of them took a video , but i never asked him to give it to me so i can have it too..But i have one pic i took...It was near jacksonville,we were  on the open sea,and we needed like whole day to come to jacksonville,so i 'm not sure about the distance..I was not so much suprised acctually...Don't know...But i didn't have a time to take a video just a picture of it,because i just wanted to wach it...
content.summary: Bright light spreading the light sooo bright,going in straight to another spot like a star or something..Than shut of the lights and just disapired...

content.detailedDescription: I am quite familiar with various types of aircraft and am an avid watcher of the skies. last night as i tried to go to sleep, i noticed what i thought was a bright star outside my window. the kind of star that gives off heavy flashes of blue/red/ generally colorful light. then i noticed it was actually moving closer, and although very far away, i could make out that it was actually an "object"in our atmosphere.  so i thought it may be a plane from a distance, as it slowly moved. then, it clearly changed direction. as i watched closer i actually noticed that the object was hovering, yet moving back and forth, up and down, in very random erratic motions. i watched this object for close to 2 hours. it moved in all directions, quick movements... very random. the only general path it kept was an ascending one, as it eventually ascended so far that i could no longer see it.
content.summary: Very high elevation. star-like. very erratic, hours-long.

content.detailedDescription: Stargazing as usual, 9 pm viewed something not a star too wide too bright. viewed with binoculars and saw cylinder shape, definition of a structure.  snapped at least 20 photos zoomed in and saw it was definitely a cylinder then other views showed an end as if looking down a hollow pipe, later pictures again showed closer definitely structure encaved, and a cylinder body. the object zoomed a few feet down then became stationery for two hours before the clouds moved in.
content.summary: Avid stargazing. bright and strange glow. binoculars sky scout then camera shots zoomed in showed cylinder, grey white pulsating lights, then turned to show hollow ends  like looking down a pipe, then turned and showed cylinder shape. some pics show cle.

content.detailedDescription:
My friend called my attention to the sky and when i looked up red orange glowing balls were coming up over the mountain to the north into a v shaped pattern .The first two split one left and one right at a fast pace the next
2 shot up then split one to the left and one to the right.Then more were added to the v pattern about 4 these just disappeared slowly. i called my boyfriend and told him to come outside and look at the lights in the sky only whej 3 were left hovering together and then they slowly disapeared
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 10 red orange glowing balls came over mountain into a v pattern then first 2 split left &right next 2 up then left & right until 3 were left that hovered until disapearim

content.detailedDescription:
Foto tomada en la playa de pichidangue al norte de valparaiso, por un colega profesor.
la foto fue tomada a un grupo de pelicanos que pasaban por encima de mi colega, cuando aparecio este objeto luminoso frente a esta bandada de pajaros...
content.summary: Disco resplandeciente

content.detailedDescription: The object,which didnt seen to have any solid shape seemed to fly towards an airliner as it was landing about a mile or two from heathrow airport..It then seemed to change direction and fly away from the airport direction.There was no noise an it didnt seen to be going too fast..I thought it was strange that it was flying very close to the heathrow inbound flight path.
content.summary: Black strange shape object fling above heathrow airport flight path

content.detailedDescription: I noticed object after looking at photos i've taken.
content.summary: Ordinary day. taking pictures of my friend (15 per second).

content.detailedDescription: On 3/26/2016 at 11:40 at night i witnessed several orange orbs on the horizon on my way home from work. i initially thought these objects were perhaps lantern fireworks or shooting stars but they were stationary and larger than any firework lantern i had seen before. there were 5 in total and as i was observing them in my car, the one i was looking at directly ahead of me changed into a disc shaped craft with four circular bright white lights. two of the lights on either side blinked at a steady pace. the other orbs i saw began to change as well and had different colors but were essentially the same type of craft and took off in different directions so i lost sight of them. i was already driving in the same direction as the white ufo by coincidence so i kept an eye on it the whole time as i was driving home. one of my neighbors had stopped his car and was filming on the side of the road so i knew i wasnt the only one who saw them. when i got home i also decided to capture it on my phone as evidence. i wasnt necessarily scared or intimidated by the object but i was shaken because i had never seen anything as strange as this was in the sky before. it was about as high up as your average aircraft would fly but it was moving much faster. i recorded the ufo for about 3 minutes as it flew directly over my house and behind a treeline out of sight.
content.summary: Multiple orange orbs turned into 5 ufos with blinking lights flew overhead

content.detailedDescription: At 8:35 pm tonight my family and i where driving east bound on treat blvd, when we spotted these two orange glowing balls of light circling around each other to our left, we then turned off the road to film what we were watching then the two objects flew over us slowly until the shot up in the sky and disappeared .
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Two orange glowing lights swirling through the sky .

content.detailedDescription:
Observing night sky with binoculars had a friend with me.
bright solid orange object with noise..
came at us like an approaching aircraft,,sound disappered and then ascended up and disappeared in north eastern of sky.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright light came towards us , hovered then acdended up and disappered
